TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed TableCallback extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub TableCallback(tableData As ICollection)
type TableCallback = delegate of ICollection -> unit

param.name: tableData
param.span: 要从提供者检索的数据。

span.span: The data to retrieve from the provider.

summary.span: 引用在从提供者中检索表数据时要调用的方法。

span.span: References the method to call when retrieving table data from a provider.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当 Web 部件控件实现 接口，并在 Web 部件连接中充当提供程序时，使用者或转换器必须从提供程序检索和处理表数据。When a Web Parts control implements the interface and serves as a provider in a Web Parts connection, the consumer or transformer must retrieve and process the table data from the provider. 委托表示为处理提供程序数据而调用的方法。The delegate represents the method to call for processing the provider data. 此 方法包含一个 委托参数。The method contains a delegate parameter. ## Examples 下面的代码示例包含一个名为的 Web 部件控件 `TableProviderWebPart` ，该控件充当表形式的数据提供程序。The following code example contains a Web Parts control named `TableProviderWebPart` that serves as a provider of data in the form of a table. 控件包含方法的实现，该实现 接收类型的参数 。The control includes an implementation of the method, which receives a parameter of type . 此方法调用 传递表数据的委托表示的方法。This method calls the method represented by the delegate passing the table data. [!code-csharp[WebParts_TableCallback_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_TableCallback_Overview/CS/tableprovider.cs#1)] [!code-vb[WebParts_TableCallback_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_TableCallback_Overview/VB/tableprovider.vb#1)] 在 `OnPreRender` 方法中，使用者调用 `GetTableData` ， `TableProviderWebPart` 并将其 `GetTableData` 方法作为委托传递给用表数据调用，如下面的代码示例中所示。In the `OnPreRender` method, the consumer calls `GetTableData` in `TableProviderWebPart` and passes its `GetTableData` method as the delegate to call with the table data, as shown in the following code example. [!code-csharp[WebParts_TableCallback_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_TableCallback_Overview/CS/tableconsumerwebpart.cs#2)] [!code-vb[WebParts_TableCallback_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_TableCallback_Overview/VB/tableconsumerwebpart.vb#2)] 网页中包含两个控件和连接，如以下示例中所示。The two controls and the connection are included in a Web page, as shown in the following example. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_TableCallback_Overview#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_TableCallback_Overview/CS/TableConnection.aspx#3)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_TableCallback_Overview#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_TableCallback_Overview/VB/TableConnection.aspx#3)]
